TEXT.English: %s1_CityName can't carry over [ICON_PRODUCTION] overflow any more. The lost %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CityName no puede continuar preservando [ICON_PRODUCTION] sobrante. Los %d2_NumProduction[ICON_PRODUCTION] perdidos se han convertido en %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
